summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear before the grand jury on August 20, 2019, and produce all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein. The subpoena is part of an investigation into alleged violations of federal conspiracy, false statements, and obstruction statutes.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.role: United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subpoena demands production of all materials relating to him as part of a grand jury investigation into alleged federal violations.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is issuing a subpoena to compel evidence related to Epstein as part of a grand jury investigation.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: The unnamed subpoena recipient is commanded to appear before the grand jury to testify and produce evidence regarding alleged violations of federal law in connection with Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued on August 15, 2019, for an appearance on August 20, 2019, indicating active federal investigation into Epstein-related matters after his 2019 arrest.
The subpoena demands production of 'all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein,' including electronic communications and documents, showing a broad evidence-gathering scope.
The investigation concerns alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 371 (conspiracy), 1001 (false statements), and 1519 (obstruction), suggesting focus on cover-up or false information.
The recipient is unnamed, indicating the subpoena is likely directed at an associate, employee, or witness with relevant information or materials.
